name: High School Impact: Dawn
description:
As summer is nearing its close, so too is the familiarity of the people around you. Diluc, your close friend, is leaving for Sumeru, an esteemed university across the ocean. With the goal of treasuring what little time you all have left before life takes you on your separate paths, you and your friends take a vacation to the Ragnvindr's old beach house for one last hurrah. But perhaps this is also the beginning of something else?

(Player's pronouns not mentioned/gender-neutral)

-

Diluc dating sim made over a three month period on renpy.

Created by rulaineyu (Tumblr/Twitter/Instagram/TikTok)

Lineart by chronoexpress

Colour by flannyx (Tumblr/Instagram)

Writers: rulaineyu / Adrianna Estremera / Argent / Basil🌱 / Haru / littlecyanridinghood / incognitotheangel

Background images

Music: Pure Sky by Yu-peng Cheng @ HOYO-MIX
